column1: Dolly Parton once said: _____....‡If your actions create a legacy that inspires others to dream more
column2: learn more
column3: do more and become more

column1: Brendan Fraser once said: _____....‡As a young man I prayed for success. Now I just pray to be worthy of it.
Demi Lovato once said: _____....‡Your imperfections make you beautiful
column2: they make you who you are. So just be yourself
column3: love yourself for who you are and just keep going.

column1: Chris Pine once said: _____....‡Ignore the naysayers. Really the only option is
column2: head down and focus on the job.

column1: Kanye West once said: _____....‡If you have the opportunity to play this game called life
column2: you have to appreciate every moment.

column1: Robin Williams once said: _____....‡You’re only given a little spark of madness. You mustn’t lose it.

Joseph Gordon-Levitt once said: _____....‡Why am I doing the work I’m doing? Why am I friends with this person? Am I living the best life I possibly can? Questions are often looked upon as questions of doubt but I don’t see it that way at all. I question things to stay present
column2: to make sure I’m doing what I’m supposed to be doing.

column1: Angelina Jolie once said: _____....‡Life comes with many challenges. The ones that should not scare us are the ones we can take on and take control of.
